00026     BiasingMessenger::BiasingMessenger() { 
00027 
00028         biasingDir_->SetGuidance("LDMX physics biasing commands.");
00029 
00030         enableBiasingCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit);
00031         enableBiasingCmd_->SetGuidance("Enable physics biasing.");
00032 
00033         particleTypeCmd_->SetParameterName("type", true); 
00034         particleTypeCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit); 
00035         particleTypeCmd_->SetGuidance("The particle type to bias.");
00036     }
00037 
00038     BiasingMessenger::~BiasingMessenger() {
00039         delete enableBiasingCmd_;
00040         delete biasingDir_; 
00041     }

00043     void BiasingMessenger::SetNewValue(G4UIcommand* command, G4String newValues) { 
00044 
00045         if (command == enableBiasingCmd_) biasingEnabled_ = true; 
00046         else if (command == particleTypeCmd_) particleType_ = newValues;  
00047         else if (command == processCmd_) process_ = newValues;
00048         else if (command == thresholdCmd_)threshold_ = G4UIcommand::ConvertToDouble(newValues);
00049         else if (command == volumeCmd_) volume_ = newValues;
00050         else if (command == xsecTransCmd_) xsecTrans_ = G4UIcommand::ConvertToDouble(newValues);
00051     }
